Retrieves or submits the Annual Percentage Rate charged for each Finance Charge Rule. This is a required field when the Rule Type is Interest Rate.
Retrieves or submits the Amount of fee to be charged. This is a required field when the Rule Type is Late Fee.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
Number of days you allow from due date of an invoice before you begin to assess finance charges. A payment after the due date but during the grace period won't incur interest charges or late fees.
Number of days you allow before you begin to generate the interest or late fee document after the first processing run.

When the flag is set to Inactive, you can no longer apply the rule to a company. Though, you can continue to retrieve or update the rule. You can also submit a request to set the Finance Charge Rule back to active.

Amount.description: Retrieves or submits the Amount of fee to be charged. This is a required field when the Rule Type is Late Fee.

Annual_Percentage.description: Retrieves or submits the Annual Percentage Rate charged for each Finance Charge Rule. This is a required field when the Rule Type is Interest Rate.

Document_Generation_Grace_Period.description: Number of days you allow before you begin to generate the interest or late fee document after the first processing run.

Grace_Period.description: Number of days you allow from due date of an invoice before you begin to assess finance charges. A payment after the due date but during the grace period won't incur interest charges or late fees.

Inactive.description: When the flag is set to Inactive, you can no longer apply the rule to a company. Though, you can continue to retrieve or update the rule. You can also submit a request to set the Finance Charge Rule back to active.
